title: Looking for people for Ranked queue - high plat or low diamond.
body:
i'm an ADC main, currently plat 1, looking for some people who would want to play Ranked together. must be at least plat 3, have a mic, and have a good atitude/sense of humour - i want to climb, but you gotta have fun doing it :)

just hit me up ingame if you're keen.
